features: 11-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Positively Radiant Brightening Facial Cleanser to reveal brighter, more radiant skin
Brightening daily facial cleanser washes away dirt, oil and makeup leaving your skin looking luminous
Gentle oil-free face wash containing moisture-rich soy extract to visibly transform dull, uneven skin tone and texture into brighter, more radiant skin
Cleansing face wash helps improve skin tone, texture and clarity to enhance your natural radiance

Aveeno Positively Radiant Brightening Facial cleanser is formulated from a dermatologist recommended brand. For best results, work cleanser into a lather and massage onto wet skin. Rinse facial cleanser and pat skin dry
body.description: Aveeno Positively Radiant Brightening Facial Cleanser with moisture-rich soy extract washes away dirt, oil, and makeup to reveal brighter, more radiant skin. This gentle brightening cleanser helps improve skin's tone & texture and reduces dullness, leaving skin feeling soft & smooth. This face wash is oil-free, soap-free, hypoallergenic, & non-comedogenic, so it's gentle enough for everyday use and for sensitive skin. This facial cleanser helps improve skin's tone and texture and is formulated to remove makeup. The Positively Radiant collection is designed to enhance your natural radiance & give you a lit-from-within glow. Try other Aveeno Positively Radiant products or explore other Aveeno collections for a skin solution that's positively you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better Than High-End Cleansers!
reviews.reviewText: I’m 70 years old, so you can imagine how many different cleansers I’ve used, over the years. This cleanser works better than any I’ve ever tried, including top of the line, very high-end ones from fancy department stores. I use it AFTER using Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, which I thought did a good job of removing the minimal amount of powder makeup I use. But, using this cleanser, I still remove more makeup! It’s not abrasive, but my face actually glows, after using it. My skin is totally free of makeup and is left feeling extremely clean, soft and smooth. And, no toner is needed, afterwords.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My face is clear and smooth and even toned
reviews.reviewText: I keep one in the shower and one in the kitchen sink area. I like to was my face a few times a day if not wearing make up. Keeps my skin clean and clear. I love the new large bottle. I keep on 3 month renewal you can't beat the price and I don't have to try to find it in store. I love this face wash! I use it along with IT cosmetic confidence in a cream! It's so good I can post a make up free selfie after 40! Yep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I often feel that facewashes have overwhelming scents that take my breath away, which I hate. This facewash does not do that. The scent is refreshing and wonderfully subtle. In addition to the scent, the facewash is so easy on my skin. Many facewashes cause me to have break outs, whereas this one does not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but shipping a problem
reviews.reviewText: I've used this (and other Aveeno) products for years - this one cleans well, does not dry and leaves my sensitive skin looking really good. However on this order, Amazon shipped the product in a box with no packing material so it was bounced around in transit. By the time I received it, the top had worked loose and some of the contents had leaked over everything. Amazon, you need to re-think this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This face wash is very good and a nice size, I will purchase again. It was also delivered exactly when promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Daily Facial Cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: This product lathers quickly and makes my face feel refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin is shiny again!
reviews.reviewText: I previously used this in Australia and had so many compliments when I used it. They don’t sell it there anymore so imagine my happiness when I saw it still sold here. My skin was dull after I had my baby but now it’s starting to be shiny again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: This is a repeat buy for me. I love Aveeno facial products. The scent is pleasant, and it does not dry out your face.
